name: tasktrack
description: TaskTrack - Full Stack Task Management Application

scripts.build: npm run build:client && npm run copy-client && npm run build:server
scripts.build:client: cd client && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build:server: cd server && npm install && npm run build
scripts.copy-client: node -e "const fs=require('fs');const path=require('path');const src='client/dist';const dest='server/client/dist';if(fs.existsSync(src)){fs.mkdirSync(dest,{recursive:true});const copy=(src,dest)=>{if(fs.statSync(src).isDirectory()){fs.mkdirSync(dest,{recursive:true});fs.readdirSync(src).forEach(file=>copy(path.join(src,file),path.join(dest,file)));}else{fs.copyFileSync(src,dest);}};copy(src,dest);console.log('Client copied to server directory');}else{console.log('Client dist not found');}"
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd server && npm run dev" "cd client && npm run dev"
scripts.install-all: cd client && npm install && cd ../server && npm install
scripts.deploy:render: npm run install-all && npm run build && npm start
